page.title: 13LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: These are surveys taken from a sample of 100 families in the study area concerning shopping habits and leisure pursuits. Shopping: 18% use only local shops. 13% use only distant facilities 69% use both local and distant shops. Leisure: 80% of sample use local library facilities. Almost all the children in sample attend one or more of the local societies or clubs, e.g. 28% swimming club, 38% Guides, Scouts, etc. 20% Youth Clubs. Similarly most adults belong to various organisations, although some 50% travel outside the local area.
